message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I really appreciate it. However, $90 is a bit out of my budget right now. I'd be willing to pay $85 for it.  What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $90 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $87 for the product. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
